st: Aakhiya De kolo Sada Reh sajna,
s:
Aakhiya De kolo Sada Reh sajna,
Assi Lakh War Tak Ke Vi Nahi Rajna,
Mukhra Na Mori Sada Zor Koi Na,
Kade Chaad Ke Na Javi Sada Hor Koi Na.

st: Khamoshi naal na maar mainu Eh taan dass mera kasoor ki hai Ya taan katal kar de yaa gal kar lai Dass dohaan vichon manzoor ki hai??
s: Khamoshi naal na maar mainu Eh taan dass mera kasoor ki hai Ya taan katal kar de yaa gal kar lai Dass dohaan vichon manzoor ki hai??

st: Koi gam de pave parchave na,
s:
Koi gam de pave parchave na,
Koi gam de pave parchave na,
jis nagree yaar vasde ne,
sanu rona de k umraan da, bhaven oh khid khid hasde ne,
Asin mangde haan sukh una da,
jinha jholi hanju paaye ne,
na roko ajj ron devo,
meinu yaar chete aye ne…!!!

st: Ki kra maan apne ap te…
s:
Ki kra maan apne ap te…
Jad tere warge pathra naal yari lai…
Kismat nu dewa ki dosh mai, Jad yaar he kr gya bewafai..
Chunde c tenu apna bnauna…
Par tu sadi kimat kakh na pai..
Chadiya na kise joga, Har passe te kitti duniaa sade li paraee..
Har passe te kitti dunia sade li paraai…!!

Heer Ranjhe de wangu
Sadi Love v Badi Unique c,
Aasi Ik Duje de ho k v Vichad jana..
Kyuki Ehi Sadi Taqdir c…

Assi Dillan De Raje Rabba,
Koi Sohni G Saade V Jholli Pa De Rabba,
Rang Roop Shona Na V Hoya Chl Ju Ge,
Bs Eda De Hove Jo Saade Agge Piche Hoi Pagal Phire Raaba,
Mapya Da Krn Satkar Vaali Hove,
Te Sanu Subha-Subha Love You Keh Ke Uthaan Vaali Hove…

st: Hun sady ekale rehn dia gllan ne.
s:
Hun sady ekale rehn dia gllan ne.
Duniya dy vich dukh sehan diya glla ne,
waqt nal badal jande ne sb.
Koi nai nibhanda sb kehan diya gllan ne.

st: aaj kal de yaar paise de..
s:
aaj kal de yaar paise de..
aaj kal de pyar paise de..
sajna de aitbar paise de..
begaane te rishtedar paise de..
pra pra nu maari janda..
kyoki aaj kal vihaar paise de..
yaar yaar nu khayi jande..
kyoki aaj kal kamm kar paise de

st: Pela likhia chithia mai tenu, oo fir ikk ikk kar ke paar tia
s:
Pela likhia chithia mai tenu, oo fir ikk ikk kar ke paar tia
ley tasveeran terian, paa hanjju agg la saar tia
ikk tu hi si…..bas tu hi si…jo sadda saath na nibha saki
milia si jo sannu jagira, sabb tere sir to vaar tia

st: MILI ZINDAGI JEEN LAYI, TA JEE LAYI MAI
s:
MILI ZINDAGI JEEN LAYI, TA JEE LAYI MAI
LIKHI PEENI VICH KISMAT, TA PEE LAYI MAI
NA PEENDA MAI TA RABB JHOOTHA HUNDA
MANNKE US RABB DI, GALTI KAR KEE LAYI MAI

st: ishq duniya wich dardan da sartaj hunda hai,
s:
ishq duniya wich dardan da sartaj hunda hai,
Es rog da na koi ilaz hunda hai ,
ishq wich har ke pta lgda h a,
ke Ishq v sohniyan shaklan da mohtaj hunda hai

st: Kujh palan de pal hun saal vich ne,
s:
Kujh palan de pal hun saal vich ne,
Asi ohde te oh mere khayal vich ne,
Ikla c pehla par be-parwa c zindgi,
Hun fikar lagi rehindi hai ke oh kis hal vich ne

st: Dosti vich hoi Bewafai taan Vekhi jaugi,
s:
Dosti vich hoi Bewafai taan Vekhi jaugi,
Dosti vich hoi Bewafai taan Vekhi jaugi,
Je tu preet na nibhai taan Vekhi jaugi,
Main rab de kehan te zindagi nahi chhadni,
Je tu apni kasam pavayi taan Vekhi jaugi.

Hasna Ohdi Di Aadat Si..
Assi Galat Andaja La Bethe..
Oh Hasde Hasde Vasde Rahe..
Te Assi Apna Aap Gua Bethe…!
